meanings.definition: A limousine is a large, luxurious car, especially one driven by a chauffeur.
meanings.sent1: The limos lined up outside the hotel were shiny and elegant.
meanings.sent2: We arrived at the party in style, stepping out of the limos onto the red carpet.
meanings.sent3: The limos seemed to be whispering secrets to each other as they waited in the parking lot.
meanings.sent4: The limos glided through the city streets like graceful swans.
meanings.sent5: The limos exuded an air of sophistication and class as they pulled up to the venue.

meanings.definition: Limos can refer to more than one limousine.
meanings.sent1: There were multiple limos parked outside, each more glamorous than the next.
meanings.sent2: The limos in the convoy stretched for miles, a symbol of opulence and luxury.
meanings.sent3: The limos seemed to be having a race, vying for the title of the shiniest vehicle.
meanings.sent4: The limos stood out in the traffic like jewels in a sea of ordinary cars.
meanings.sent5: The limos sparkled under the sunlight, catching everyone's attention as they passed by.
